## Math expression  

inline style of math expression  
$f(k) = {n \choose k} p^{k}(1-p)^{n - k}$  


display style of math expression  
$$f(k) = {n \choose k} p^{k}(1-p)^{n - k}$$ 

math environment inside `$ $ or $$ $$` inline and display style    


array  
$$\begin{array}{ccc}
x_{11} & x_{12} & x_{13} \\
x_{21} & x_{22} & x_{23}  
\end{array}$$


bmatrix  
$X = \begin{bmatrix}1 & x_{1}\\
1 & x_{2} \\
1 & x_{3}
\end{bmatrix}$


pmatrix  
$$\Theta = \begin{pmatrix}\alpha & \beta\\  
\gamma & \delta 
\end{pmatrix}$$


vmatrix  
$\begin{vmatrix}a & b \\
c & d
\end{vmatrix}=ad-bc$
